name: BIGIQ-CM
body:
> The contents of this page are workflow guides that will allow development/operations to create automation around specific task/s.
> Each workflow guide will contain a url link, under step operations, to the respective reference rest api document broken out under references below.
> Once reviewed and approved by test, field and support, contents will be deployed to a devcentral.com BIGIQ wiki for general consumption.
> Thank you for your support.

##Workflows

- [Enable, Disable, and Force Offline Pool Members](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_enable_disable_force_offline_pool_members.md)
- [Apply and Deploy Firewall Policies](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_apply_deploy_firewall_policies.md)
- [Establish trust](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_establish_trust.md)
- [Discover adc/ltm](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_discover_ltm.md)
- [Discover afm](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_discover_afm.md)
- [Import adc/ltm](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_import_ltm.md)
- [View status of ltm objects](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_view_status_of_ltm_objects.md)
- [Asm list search policies](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_list_search_policies.md)
- [Asm list virtual servers with policy reference](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_asm_virtual_servers.md)
- [Asm get a active policy for a virtual server](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_asm_virtual_servers_on_specific_device.md)
- [Asm associate a policy with a virtual server](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_associate_policy_to_virtual_server.md)
- [Asm change policy enforcement mode](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_change_policy_enforcement_mode.md)
- [Asm create a default policy](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_create_default_policy.md)
- [Asm deploy configuration](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_deploy_configuration.md)
- [Asm find policies in use](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_find_policies_in_use.md)
- [Asm find policies in use for a specific device](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_find_policies_in_use_on_specific_device.md)
- [Asm retrieve a security event log record using support id](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_get_event_log_record_by_support_id.md)
- [Asm retrieve reference links to policy subcollection](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_list_policy_parameters.md)
- [Asm list signatures for a policy](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_list_policy_signatures.md)
- [Asm list search for policy](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_list_search_policies.md)
- [Asm enable and enforce signature in a policy by signature id](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/asm/t_update_policy_signatures.md)
- [Licensing - Init](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_license_initial_activation.md)
- [Licensing - Purchased pool](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_purchased_pool_license.md)
- [Licensing - Purchased pool add member](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/markdown/t_purchased_pool_license_member.md)

##References

- [Establish trust](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/device-trust.adoc)
- [Discover bigip configuration](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/device-discovery.adoc)
- [Adc-core discovery/import configuration](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/adc-core-discovery_import.adoc)
- [Firewall discovery/import configuration](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/firewall-discovery_import.adoc)
- [Asm discovery/import configuration](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/asm-discovery_import.adoc)
- [Deploy configuration](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/deploy-configuration.adoc)
- [License purchased pools](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/license-purchased-pools.adoc)
- [License registration key pool](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/license-registration-key-pool.adoc)
- [Adc self service enable/disable pool member](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/adc-self-service.adoc)
- [Virtual Server management](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/virtual-server-management.adoc)
- [Pool member management](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/pool-member-management.adoc)
- [Application node management](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/application-server-node-management.adoc)
- [Firewall policy management](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/firewall-policies.adoc)
- [Asm policies](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/asm-policies.adoc)
- [Asm attack signatures](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/asm-attack-signatures.adoc)
- [Firewall context management](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/firewalls.adoc)
- [Apm (Access) kill user sessions](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/access-kill-user-sessions.adoc)
- [Apm (Access) revoke oauth token sessions](https://github.com/carldubois/bigiq-cm-restapi-reference/blob/master/adoc/access-revoke-oauth-token-sessions.adoc)
